end’ and a ‘tail end’. Defects in 
this tube are the cause of spina 
bifida.	The	heart	is	also	forming	
and your baby already has some 
blood vessels. A string of these 
blood vessels connects your 
baby	to	you	–	this	will	become	
the umbilical cord.
Weeks 6–7
There is now a large bulge 
where your baby’s heart is and 
a bump for the head because 
The umbilical cord
The umbilical cord is a 
baby’s lifeline. It is the link 
between you and your 
baby. Blood circulates
